trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A>中<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>方法</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string key of the startup script to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的启动脚本字符串键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the startup script is registered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已注册的启动脚本;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether page validation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示页验证是否成功。

trans-unit.source: For this property to return `true`, all validation server controls in the current validation group must validate successfully.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`，当前的验证组中的所有验证服务器控件都必须都验证成功。

trans-unit.source: You should check this property only after you have called the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or set the `CausesValidation` property to `true` in the `OnServerClick` event handler for an ASP.NET server control that initiates form processing.
trans-unit.target: 只有具有调用之后，应检查此属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法或一组`CausesValidation`属性`true`中`OnServerClick`启动窗体处理的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These server controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> classes.
trans-unit.target: 这些服务器控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: If you force validation of a validation group using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> method, then all validation controls in the specified validation group must validate successfully as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制验证的验证组使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>方法，则指定的验证组中的所有验证控件必须成功验证也。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if page validation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果页验证成功;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The IsValid property is called before validation has occurred.
trans-unit.target: IsValid 属性称为之前发生验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of objects stored in the page context.
trans-unit.target: 获取页上下文中存储的对象列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the Items property to store objects with the same lifetime as the page request.
trans-unit.target: 使用项目属性将具有相同的生存期的对象存储为页面请求。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can add objects to the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，你可以将对象添加到<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>对象返回。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Objects added to the Items property are available throughout the lifetime of the page, so you can add objects to the Items property in events early in the page life cycle and access those objects in later events.
trans-unit.target: 添加到项属性的对象都的整个生存期内页上，提供的因此可以在页生命周期的初期将对象添加到事件中的项属性，还可以访问更高版本的事件中的那些对象。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing objects stored in the page context.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含页上下文中存储的对象。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale identifier for the <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> object associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 设置的区域设置标识符<xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>与页关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The `LCID` attribute can be set in the directive of the .aspx file, however, the preferred method of setting the locale identifier is through the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `LCID`可以在.aspx 文件指令中设置属性，但是，设置的区域设置标识符的首选的方法是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier to pass to the <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要传递到的区域设置标识符<xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs at the end of the load stage of the page's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在页面的生命周期加载阶段结束时发生。

trans-unit.source: The LoadComplete event occurs after all postback data and view-state data is loaded into the page and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A> method has been called for all controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: LoadComplete 事件发生后所有回发数据和视图状态数据加载到页和之后<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A>已为页面上的所有控件调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Loads any saved view-state information to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 任何保存到的视图状态信息的加载<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> property to load any saved view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium 方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName>所引用对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A>属性加载任何保存的视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two descendents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class that saves state in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> object associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包括两个子代的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类，<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>将状态信息保存在 ASP.NET 页中包含的隐藏字段的类和<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>中保存状态的类<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A>与请求关联的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 若要将状态保存在你选择的位置，你应创建一个新的派生<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类，该类将保存并加载到持久性介质的所选的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> object, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例创建一个新的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>对象，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to load the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state from anything other than a hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1，重写此方法，如果你想要加载<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>状态从隐藏的字段之外的任何内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do so, you must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你选择这样做，则还必须重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A>

trans-unit.source: The saved view state.
trans-unit.target: 保存的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to return the user to the same position in the client browser after postback.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在回发后将用户返回到客户端浏览器中的同一位置。

trans-unit.source: This property replaces the obsolete <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation*> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性取代了已过时<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation*>

trans-unit.source: When Web pages are posted back to the server, the user is returned to the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 当网页是回发到服务器，则用户将返回到页面顶部。

trans-unit.source: On long Web pages, this means that the user has to scroll the page back to the last position on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在较长的网页，这意味着，用户必须向下滚动页面回发到页面上的最后一个位置。

trans-unit.source: When the MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack property is set to `true`, the user is instead returned to the last position on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当 MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack 属性设置为`true`，则用户将改为返回到最后一个位置的页上。

trans-unit.source: You set the MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack property in the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置 MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack 属性[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client position should be maintained; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应保持客户端位置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the physical path that a virtual path, either absolute or relative, or an application-relative path maps to.
trans-unit.target: 检索虚拟路径，绝对或相对的还是相对于应用程序路径映射到的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the virtual path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>表示虚拟路径。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The physical path associated with the virtual path or application-relative path.
trans-unit.target: 与的虚拟路径或相对于应用程序路径关联的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the master page that determines the overall look of the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取确定页面的整体外观的主页面。

trans-unit.source: The Master property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage> object associated with this page.
trans-unit.target: 主属性返回<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>对象关联的这一页。</xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，你可以设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>

trans-unit.source: The Master property is valid only on pages that reference a master page in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 属性是仅在上有效的主机页该引用母版页中的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you access the Master property on a page that does not reference a master page, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果访问主属性不引用母板页的页面上`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a master page are not available until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: 母版页的内容不可用，直到后<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MasterPage"></xref> associated with this page if it exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MasterPage"> </xref>与此页上，如果它存在关联; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual path of the master page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置母版页的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The MasterPageFile property is a virtual path (from the root of the application) of the master page file associated with this page.
trans-unit.target: MasterPageFile 属性是虚拟路径 （从应用程序的根目录） 关联的这一页的母版页文件。

trans-unit.source: The MasterPageFile property can be set only in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event; attempting to set the MasterPageFile property after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 该 MasterPageFile 属性可以设置仅在<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件; 正在尝试设置后的 MasterPageFile 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>

trans-unit.source: If the MasterPageFile property is not valid, an exception of type <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is thrown later in the page life cycle, but no exception is thrown when the property is set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MasterPageFile 属性无效，类型的异常<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发更高版本中页的生命周期，但不会引发异常时在该属性设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> </xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: Pages that have the MasterPageFile property set are content pages, and therefore can contain only top-level controls that are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> controls.
trans-unit.target: MasterPageFile 属性设置的页是内容页，并因此可包含仅顶级控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the master page.
trans-unit.target: 主控页的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The MasterPageFile property is set after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref> event is complete.
trans-unit.target: MasterPageFile 属性后设置<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref>事件已完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length for the page's state field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置页面的状态字段的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: When the MaxPageStateFieldLength property is set to a positive number, the view state sent to the client browser is broken into multiple hidden fields, and each field's value is less than the size specified in the MaxPageStateFieldLength property.
trans-unit.target: 当 MaxPageStateFieldLength 属性设置为正数时，发送到客户端浏览器的视图状态分为多个隐藏的字段，并且每个字段的值小于 MaxPageStateFieldLength 属性中指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Setting the MaxPageStateFieldLength property to a negative number (the default) indicates that the view-state field should not be separated into chunks.
trans-unit.target: 将 MaxPageStateFieldLength 属性设置为负数 （默认值） 指示不应该将视图状态字段分隔成多个块。

trans-unit.source: Setting the MaxPageStateFieldLength to a small number may result in poor performance.
trans-unit.target: 将 MaxPageStateFieldLength 设置为数量较少可能会导致性能不佳。

trans-unit.source: Set the value of the MaxPageStateFieldLength property in the of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 设置中的 MaxPageStateFieldLength 属性的值的 Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length, in bytes, for the page's state field.
trans-unit.target: 最大长度，以字节为单位，有关该页面的状态字段。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1。

trans-unit.source: The MaxPageStateFieldLength property is not equal to -1 or a positive number.
trans-unit.target: MaxPageStateFieldLength 属性不等于-1 或一个正数。

trans-unit.source: The MaxPageStateFieldLength property was set after the page was initialized.
trans-unit.target: 页已初始化后，已设置 MaxPageStateFieldLength 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the "description" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置"description"的内容<xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings.
trans-unit.target: HTML`meta`元素可用于提高搜索引擎列表。

trans-unit.source: The "description" `meta` element is used by some search engines to improve listing previews.
trans-unit.target: "Description"`meta`某些搜索引擎使用元素来改善列表预览。

trans-unit.source: If there is no "description" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有"描述"`meta`中的元素`head`的页标记中，元素`meta`呈现页时，将元素添加到页面。

trans-unit.source: If the page markup already has a "description" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果页面标记已有"description"`meta`元素，此属性获取或设置`content`属性`meta`元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in the directive.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以在指令中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The content of the "description" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: "说明"的内容<xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The page does not have a header control (a <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""></xref> element with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref> attribute set to "server").
trans-unit.target: 页没有标头控件 ( <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""> </xref>具有元素<xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref>属性设置为"server")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the "keywords" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置"关键字"的内容<xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings.
trans-unit.target: HTML`meta`元素可用于提高搜索引擎列表。

trans-unit.source: The "keywords" `meta` element is either not used at all or is given very little weight by the major search engines.
trans-unit.target: "关键字"`meta`元素根本或者不使用或由主要的搜索引擎提供很少的权重。

trans-unit.source: If there is no "keywords" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何"关键字"`meta`中的元素`head`的页标记中，元素`meta`呈现页时，将元素添加到页面。

trans-unit.source: If the page markup already has a "keywords" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果页面标记已有"关键字"`meta`元素，此属性获取或设置`content`属性`meta`元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in the directive.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以在指令中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The content of the "keywords" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: "关键字"的内容<xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The page does not have a header control (a <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""></xref> element with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref> attribute set to "server").
trans-unit.target: 页没有标头控件 ( <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""> </xref>具有元素<xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref>属性设置为"server")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the model binding execution context.
trans-unit.target: 获取模型绑定执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: The model binding execution context.
trans-unit.target: 模型绑定执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: If the model binding execution context is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, a new one is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型绑定执行上下文<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，一个新的创建并返回一个。

trans-unit.source: Gets the model state dictionary object that contains the state of the model and of model-binding validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含的模型和模型绑定验证状态的模型状态字典对象。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The model state dictionary object.
trans-unit.target: 模型状态字典对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event to initialize the page.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件来初始化页。

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method performs the initialization and setup steps required to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法执行创建所需的初始化和安装步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the page's life cycle, declared server controls on the page are initialized to their default state; however, the view state of each control is not yet populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段中的页面的生命周期，该页上声明的服务器控件初始化为其默认状态;但是，将不填充每个控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: A control on the page cannot access other server controls on the page during the `Page_Init` phase, regardless of whether the other controls are child or parent controls.
trans-unit.target: 页上的控件无法访问期间页上的其他服务器控件`Page_Init`阶段，而不考虑其他控件是否子项或父控件。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保证其他服务器控件都可创建并准备好进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A> method and before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法之后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A>方法和之前<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete"></xref> event after page initialization.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete"></xref>页初始化之后的事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnInitComplete method is called after page initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 页初始化完成后调用 OnInitComplete 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the page's life cycle, all declared controls on the page are initialized, but the page's view state is not yet populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段的页面的生命周期中，所有声明的页上的控件进行初始化，但尚未填充页面的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: You can access server controls, but they will not yet contain information returned from the user.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问服务器控件，但它们将不包含从用户返回的信息。

trans-unit.source: The OnInitComplete method occurs at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> initialization stage and before the load stage.
trans-unit.target: OnInitComplete 方法发生末尾<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>初始化阶段和之前的加载阶段。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnInitComplete method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnInitComplete 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref> event at the end of the page load stage.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref>末尾的页加载阶段的事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnLoadComplete method is called at the end of the page load stage.
trans-unit.target: 在页面加载阶段的末尾调用 OnLoadComplete 方法。

trans-unit.source: At this point in the page life cycle, all postback data and view-state data is loaded into controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: 此时在页的生命周期，所有的回发数据和视图状态数据加载到页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnLoadComplete method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnLoadComplete 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.target: 此外将与视图状态和回发数据加载在 OnPreLoad 方法中创建的控件。

trans-unit.source: The PageAdapter property returns the specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter> object that modifies the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object for the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: PageAdapter 属性返回特定于<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>修改的行为的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>请求浏览器的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter> object is determined by examining characteristics of the incoming <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 特定于<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>对象确定通过检查传入的特征<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: When an adapter is chosen for the request, any life cycle events on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter> object override the corresponding events on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: 在任何生命周期事件、 请求选择适配器时<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>对象替代的相应事件上<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"></xref> object associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"></xref>与页关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 请求和响应是本质上是无状态。

trans-unit.source: To maintain state between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state.
trans-unit.target: 要保持 HTTP 请求之间的状态，ASP.NET 服务器页可以存储<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the page.
trans-unit.target: 此状态，称为视图状态，它包含的页面和控件设置使页和控件显示就像它们是相同的用户所看到并与之交互到页其最后一个往返行程的数据。

trans-unit.source: Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page.
trans-unit.target: 有几种机制来存储到同一页上的连续请求之间的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class represents the base class for these state storage mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: 抽象<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类表示这些状态存储机制的基类。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: Page developers will typically not need to use the PageStatePersister property.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员通常不需要使用 PageStatePersister 属性。

trans-unit.source: The PageStatePersister property is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控件开发人员在扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>的功能使用 PageStatePersister 属性

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"></xref> associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"> </xref>与页关联。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the EVENTARGUMENT hidden field in the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，在所呈现页面上定义所引起隐藏的字段。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before page initialization.
trans-unit.target: 在页初始化之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event enables you to check conditions of the page request, such as whether the page is being loaded in response to a postback.
trans-unit.target: 此事件使您能够检查页请求，如是否正在加载页回发到响应中的条件。

trans-unit.source: You can also check the values of profile properties.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以检查配置文件属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The event enables you to set values that are used later in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 事件可以设置更高版本在页的生命周期中使用的值。

trans-unit.source: You can dynamically set a master page or a theme for the requested page, and create dynamic controls.
trans-unit.target: 可以动态设置母版页或主题对于请求的页，并创建动态控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the PreInit event fits into the ASP.NET life cycle, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何 PreInit 事件适合 ASP.NET 生命周期的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the page <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 在页面之前发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The PreLoad event is raised after all postback data processing and before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 所有回发数据处理之后，并在引发预加载事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: There is a second attempt to load postback data before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnLoadComplete%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: 第二个尝试加载之前的回发数据<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnLoadComplete%2A>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnLoadComplete%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the page content is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 在将页内容呈现之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The PreRenderComplete event is raised when the pre-render stage of the page life cycle is complete.
trans-unit.target: 完成页生命周期的预呈现阶段时，引发 PreRenderComplete 事件。

trans-unit.source: At this stage of the page life cycle, all controls are created, any pagination required is completed, and the page is ready to render to the output.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段的页的生命周期中，创建所有控件、 完成所需的任何分页，和页已准备好呈现到输出。

trans-unit.source: This is the last event raised before the page's view state is saved.
trans-unit.target: 这是保存页面的视图状态之前引发的最后一个事件。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the page that transferred control to the current page.
trans-unit.target: 获取传输到当前页的控件的页面。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method or use cross-page posting to transfer processing from one ASP.NET page to another, the originating page contains request information that might be required for the destination page.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法或使用跨页面发送将处理从一个 ASP.NET 页传输到另一个，起始页包含可能要求的目标页的请求信息。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the PreviousPage property to access that information.
trans-unit.target: PreviousPage 属性可用于访问该信息。

trans-unit.source: If the current page is being rendered as a result of a direct request (not a transfer or cross-post from another page), the PreviousPage property contains `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前页呈现 （不是传输或从另一页的跨 post），直接请求的结果 PreviousPage 属性包含`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> representing the page that transferred control to the current page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref>表示传输到当前页的控件的页。

trans-unit.source: The current user is not allowed to access the previous page.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户不被允许访问前一页。

trans-unit.source: -or- ASP.NET routing is in use and the previous page's URL is a routed URL.
trans-unit.target: -或-ASP.NET 路由正在使用中前, 一页的 URL 是路由的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET checks access permissions, it assumes that the URL is an actual path to a file.
trans-unit.target: 当 ASP.NET 检查访问权限时，它假设 URL 到文件的实际路径。

trans-unit.source: Because this is not the case with a routed URL, the check fails.
trans-unit.target: 因为这不是最情况下使用的路由的 URL，该检查失败。

trans-unit.source: Sets the intrinsic server objects of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Response*>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Application*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 设置的内部服务器对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>对象，如<> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<> *1> 属性。

trans-unit.source: You should not call this method.
trans-unit.target: 不应调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request*>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response*>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>提供对内部服务器对象的引用的对象 (例如， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>) 用于 HTTP 请求提供服务。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control that caused the postback that it should handle an incoming postback event.
trans-unit.target: 通知服务器控件导致回发，它应处理传入的回发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object calls the RaisePostBackEvent method when a postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象调用 RaisePostBackEvent 方法时产生的回发。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 加载和更改通知都已完成之后但尚未预呈现发生之前，此调用是在页的生命周期中。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET server control that caused the postback.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 服务器控件导致回发。

trans-unit.source: This control must implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此控件必须实现<xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: The postback argument.
trans-unit.target: 回发的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Declares a value that is declared as an ECMAScript array declaration when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 声明了一个呈现页时被声明为一个 ECMAScript 数组声明的值。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used by script-based controls to declare themselves within an array so that a client script library can work with all the controls of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以由基于脚本的控件，用于在数组内声明本身，以便客户端脚本库可以使用的相同类型的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterArrayDeclaration method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: RegisterArrayDeclaration 方法已被否决。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>中<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>方法</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the array in which to declare the value.
trans-unit.target: 中要在其中声明值的数组的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value to place in the array.
trans-unit.target: 要置于数组中的值。

trans-unit.source: Registers a new asynchronous task with the page.
trans-unit.target: 向页中注册新的异步任务。

trans-unit.source: Define an asynchronous task using the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask> class.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个异步任务使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask>

trans-unit.source: When the task is defined, use the RegisterAsyncTask method to register the task with the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了任务，使用 RegisterAsyncTask 方法替换为页注册任务。

trans-unit.source: After registering the task, invoke the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks%2A> method to begin the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 注册任务之后, 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks%2A>方法，以开始异步任务。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RegisterAsyncTask method can be used with both synchronous and asynchronous pages.
trans-unit.target: RegisterAsyncTask 方法可以用于同步和异步页。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask"></xref> that defines the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask"> </xref>定义异步任务。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous task is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 异步任务是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Emits client-side script blocks to the response.
trans-unit.target: 发出的响应的客户端脚本块。

trans-unit.source: The client-side script is emitted just after the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's `<form runat= server>` element.
trans-unit.target: 客户端脚本的开始标记之后，将发出<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象的`<form runat= server>`元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: Be sure to include opening and closing `<script>` elements around the script block string specified in the `script` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 请务必包括打开和关闭`<script>`元素周围的脚本块中指定的字符串`script`参数。

trans-unit.source: Because this method uses a key to identify the script block, the script block does not have to be emitted to the output stream each time it is requested by a different server control instance.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法使用密钥来标识脚本块，则不需要发送到输出流请求的其他服务器控件实例每次脚本块。

trans-unit.source: Using a key also decreases the likelihood of different controls' script blocks interfering with each other.
trans-unit.target: 使用密钥也减少了不同的控件的脚本块相互干扰的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Any script blocks with the same `key` parameter values are considered duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 任何脚本块具有相同`key`参数值被视为重复项。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Remember to include HTML comment tags around your script so that it will not be rendered if the requesting browser does not support scripts.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 请记住包括解决你的脚本的 HTML 注释标记，以便它将不会呈现请求浏览器不支持脚本。

trans-unit.target: RegisterClientScriptBlock 方法已被否决。

trans-unit.source: Unique key that identifies a script block.
trans-unit.target: 标识脚本块的唯一键。

trans-unit.source: Content of script that is sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 发送到客户端的脚本内容。

trans-unit.source: Allows server controls to automatically register a hidden field on the form.
trans-unit.target: 允许服务器控件自动注册该窗体上的隐藏的字段。

trans-unit.source: The field will be sent to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"></xref> server control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 该字段将发送到<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>对象时<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"></xref>呈现服务器控件。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A>中<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>方法</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unique name of the hidden field to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 要呈现的隐藏字段的唯一名称。

trans-unit.source: The value to be emitted in the hidden form.
trans-unit.target: 要在隐藏的表单中发出的值。

trans-unit.target: 使页能够访问客户端<xref uid="langword_csharp_OnSubmit" name="OnSubmit" href=""></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The script should be a function call to client code registered elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本应是对注册在其他地方的客户端代码的函数调用。

trans-unit.target: RegisterOnSubmitStatement 方法已被否决。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>中<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>方法</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unique key that identifies a script block.
trans-unit.target: 标识脚本块的唯一键。

trans-unit.source: The client-side script to be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 要发送到客户端的客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as one whose control state must be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 将控件注册一个必须保留其控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Custom server controls that use control state must call the RegisterRequiresControlState method on each request because registration for control state is not carried over from request to request during a postback event.
trans-unit.target: 使用控件状态的自定义服务器控件必须对每个请求调用 RegisterRequiresControlState 方法，因为控件状态的注册将不会从请求到请求在回发事件。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that registration occur in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: 建议在进行注册<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: The control to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的控件。

trans-unit.source: The control to register is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的控件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterRequiresControlState method can be called only before or during the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 仅之前或期间，可以调用 RegisterRequiresControlState 方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as one that requires postback handling when the page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将控件注册为回发处理页回发到服务器时需要。

trans-unit.source: The control to be registered must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface or an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的控件必须实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>接口或<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface enables handling of post back data and raising of any post back data changed events.
trans-unit.target: 在实现某一控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>接口启用的回发数据处理和引发的任何帖子备份数据更改事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the server control event model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件的事件模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Register controls with the page at or before the `Page_PreRender` event of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 使用页或之前注册控件`Page_PreRender`页生命周期事件。

trans-unit.source: The control to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的控件。

trans-unit.source: The control to register does not implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的控件不实现<xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: Registers an ASP.NET server control as one requiring an event to be raised when the control is processed on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 服务器控件注册为一个需要一个事件，它在上的控件进行处理时，会引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Only one server control can be registered per page request.
trans-unit.target: 只有一台服务器控件可以注册每个页请求。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterRequiresRaiseEvent must be used when the control does not include its control ID in the form post data.
trans-unit.target: 当控件不包含其控件 ID 的形式将数据发布，则必须使用 RegisterRequiresRaiseEvent。

trans-unit.source: Also, the control that is registered must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此外，注册的控件必须实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The control to register.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的控件。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control with the page as one requiring view-state encryption.
trans-unit.target: 将替换为页控件注册一个要求的视图状态加密。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control that deals with potentially sensitive information, call the RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption method to register the control with the page and ensure view state for the control is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发讨论与潜在敏感信息的自定义控件，调用 RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption 方法替换为页注册控件并确保控件的视图状态进行加密。

trans-unit.source: The entire page state will be encrypted if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果将加密整个页面状态<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption method must be called before or during the page <xref uid="langword_csharp_PreRender" name="PreRender" href=""></xref>phase in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 之前或期间页，必须调用 RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption 方法<xref uid="langword_csharp_PreRender" name="PreRender" href=""></xref>阶段在页生命周期中。

trans-unit.source: Emits a client-side script block in the page response.
trans-unit.target: 发出的页响应中的客户端脚本块。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method, the RegisterStartupScript method emits the script just before the closing tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's `<form runat= server>` element.
trans-unit.target: 类似于<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法，RegisterStartupScript 方法发出的结束标记之前脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象的`<form runat= server>`元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Be sure to include opening and closing `<script>` elements around the script block string specified in the `script` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 请务必包括打开和关闭`<script>`元素周围的脚本块中指定的字符串`script`参数。

trans-unit.source: Because this method uses a key to identify the script block, the script block does not have to be emitted to the output stream each time it is requested by a different server control instance Any script blocks with the same `key` parameter values are considered duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用密钥来标识脚本块，因为脚本块不必到输出流请求的其他服务器控件实例具有相同的任何脚本块每次发出`key`参数值被视为重复项。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Remember to include HTML comment tags around your script so that it will not be rendered if the requesting browser does not support scripts.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 请记住包括解决你的脚本的 HTML 注释标记，以便它将不会呈现请求浏览器不支持脚本。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterStartupScript method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: RegisterStartupScript 方法已被否决。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unique key that identifies a script block.
trans-unit.target: 标识脚本块的唯一键。

trans-unit.source: Content of script that will be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 将发送到客户端的脚本内容。

trans-unit.source: Causes page view state to be persisted, if called.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用，会导致页面视图状态，以保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterViewStateHandler method is automatically called through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm> server control.
trans-unit.target: 通过自动调用 RegisterViewStateHandler 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>

trans-unit.source: If this method is not invoked, the page view state will not be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法不会被调用，则不会保留页面视图状态。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Typically, only the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm> server control for the page calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 通常情况下，仅<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>页的服务器控件调用此方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object and calls on the child controls of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> to render.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>对象并调用的子控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>来呈现。

trans-unit.source: The Render method is responsible for creating the text and markup that is sent to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Render 方法负责创建的文本和发送到客户端浏览器的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default Render method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> to write the text and markup for the controls contained on the page.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>要写入的文本和包含的页上的控件的标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the page content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收页面内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object for the requested page.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref>请求的页对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> object contains information about the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>对象包含有关当前 HTTP 请求的信息。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref>与页关联。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object is not available.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref>对象不可用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object is registered to participate in control state management.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>对象注册来参与控制状态管理。

trans-unit.source: Control state is an object composed of critical view-state data that Web server controls need to function; it is contained in a separate object from normal view state.
trans-unit.target: 控件状态是组成关键需要函数; Web 服务器控件的视图状态数据的对象它包含在一个单独的对象从普通视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Custom controls using control state must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> method before saving control state.
trans-unit.target: 使用控件状态的自定义控件必须调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>方法，然后才能保存控件状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the RequiresControlState method to check for controls that are registered with the page as requiring control state.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RequiresControlState 方法替换为需要控件状态页注册的控件检查。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to check for a control state requirement.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>控件状态要求检查。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> requires control state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>需要控制状态; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref>与关联的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This object allows you to send HTTP response data to a client and contains information about that response.
trans-unit.target: 此对象可用于将 HTTP 响应数据发送到客户端，并包含有关该响应的信息。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref> associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref>与页关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref> object is not available.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"> </xref>对象不可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the encoding language for the current <xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前的编码语言<xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the `ResponseEncoding` attribute to the value you want using the directive in the .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 设置`ResponseEncoding`属性设为所需的.aspx 文件中使用该指令的值。

trans-unit.source: When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property.
trans-unit.target: 当请求页时，动态生成的类来设置属性。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the encoding language for the current <xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含当前的编码语言<xref href="System.Web.HttpResponse"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the current <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的当前值<xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName>实例。

trans-unit.source: If a page is running in response to a request made through ASP.NET routing, this property provides access to the URL parameter values that were passed as route data.
trans-unit.target: 如果网页正在通过 ASP.NET 路由发出的请求的响应，此属性提供访问权限作为路由数据传递的 URL 参数值。

trans-unit.source: If the page runs in response to a physical URL instead of a route URL, this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在响应而不是路由 URL 的物理 URL 运行页面，此属性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to extract the value of a URL parameter that is named `year`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何提取名为 URL 参数的值`year`。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` [C#] ``` int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ``` If the route is defined by using the URL pattern `{locale}/{year}` for the domain `contoso.com`, and if the requested URL is `contoso.com/US/2010`, `year` will contain the value "2010" when this code runs.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` [C#]``` int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ```如果使用的 URL 模式定义路由`{locale}/{year}`域`contoso.com`，以及请求的 URL 是否`contoso.com/US/2010`，`year`将包含值"2010"时此代码运行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 ASP.NET 路由的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the current <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的当前值<xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName>实例。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state and control-state information for the page.
trans-unit.target: 将保存的页面的任何视图状态，以及控制状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Save%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> property to store view-state and control-state information for the page.
trans-unit.target: SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium 方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Save%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName>所引用对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A>属性来存储页的视图状态，以及控制状态信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two descendents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class that saves state in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> object associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包括两个子代的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类，<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>将状态信息保存在 ASP.NET 页中包含的隐藏字段的类和<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>中保存状态的类<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A>与请求关联的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: Note that when using the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class the hidden VIEWSTATE field is still rendered as this is used to determine post back.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当使用<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>类隐藏的视图状态字段仍呈现因为这用于确定回发。</xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 若要将状态保存在你选择的位置，你应创建一个新的派生<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类，该类将保存并加载到持久性介质的所选的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> object, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例创建一个新的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>对象，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to save the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state in anything other than a hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1，重写此方法，如果你想要保存<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>状态的隐藏字段之外的任何内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do so, you must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你选择这样做，则还必须重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> in which to store the view-state information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要在其中存储视图状态信息。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the page has completed saving all view state and control state information for the page and controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: 发生后在页已完成保存所有视图状态和控件状态的信息页和页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: State information for controls on the Web page is saved after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreRenderComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: 在网页上的控件的状态信息保存后<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreRenderComplete>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreRenderComplete>

trans-unit.source: The SaveStateComplete event is raised after the view state and control state of the page and controls on the page are saved to the persistence medium.
trans-unit.target: 页上的控件保存到持久性介质和 SaveStateComplete 事件引发之后的视图状态和页面的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: This is the last event raised before the page is rendered to the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 这是在请求浏览器中呈现页之前引发的最后一个事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref> object, which is an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>对象，它是实例的<xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the frequently used <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath%2A> methods, among others.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供访问权限频繁使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath%2A>方法，以及其他。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref> object associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>与页关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref> object provided by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前<xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref>由 ASP.NET 提供的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property provides information about the current request's session.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供有关当前请求的会话的信息。

trans-unit.source: A `Session` object is maintained for each user that requests a page or document from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: A`Session`对象将保留为从 ASP.NET 应用程序中请求网页或文档的每个用户。

trans-unit.source: Variables stored in the `Session` object are not discarded when the user moves from page to page in the application; instead, these variables persist as long as the user is accessing pages in your application.
trans-unit.target: 变量存储在`Session`时用户将页面之间移动应用程序中，对象将不会被丢弃; 相反，这些变量将保留，只要用户访问你的应用程序中的页。

trans-unit.source: For more information about session state, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关会话状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 会话状态概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The current session-state data.
trans-unit.target: 当前的会话状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the session information is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当会话信息设置为时发生<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the browser focus to the control with the specified identifier.
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器焦点设置为具有指定标识符的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SetFocus method to make the control with the specified ID string the active control in the Web page displayed by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SetFocus 方法来实现具有指定 ID 字符串的活动控件控件的浏览器显示的网页中。

trans-unit.source: The SetFocus method must be called before the page is prepared for rendering to the client in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 页已准备好进行呈现到中的客户端之前，必须调用 SetFocus 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SetFocus method will work only on browsers supporting ECMAScript version 1.3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> SetFocus 方法将仅适用于浏览器支持 ECMAScript 1.3 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the control to set focus to.
trans-unit.target: 要将焦点设置到该控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: clientID is .
trans-unit.target: clientIDis .

trans-unit.source: Sets the browser focus to the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器焦点设置为指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SetFocus method to make the specified control the active control on the Web page displayed by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SetFocus 方法来实现指定的控件的浏览器显示的网页上的活动控件。

trans-unit.source: The SetFocus method must be called before the page is prepared for rendering to the client in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 页已准备好进行呈现到中的客户端之前，必须调用 SetFocus 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SetFocus method will work only on browsers supporting ECMAScript version 1.3 or later.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> SetFocus 方法将仅适用于浏览器支持 ECMAScript 1.3 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The control to receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 要接收焦点的控件。

trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query string value is validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否验证查询字符串值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if query string validation should be skipped (the query string should not be validated); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if query string validation should take place as normal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应跳过查询字符串验证 （查询字符串应不验证）;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果查询字符串验证应需要放置作为普通。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether smart navigation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用智能导航。

trans-unit.source: This property is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 此属性已弃用。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the `SmartNavigation` attribute to `true` in the directive in the .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 设置`SmartNavigation`属性设为`true`的指令的.aspx 文件中。

trans-unit.source: When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets this property.
trans-unit.target: 当请求页时，动态生成的类将设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In ASP.NET version 2.0, the SmartNavigation property is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在 ASP.NET 版本 2.0，SmartNavigation 属性已弃用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A>属性改为。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a page is requested by Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 browser, or later, smart navigation enhances the user's experience of the page by performing the following: - Eliminating the flash caused by navigation.
trans-unit.target: 当页面请求的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 浏览器中，或更高版本，智能导航增强了用户的体验的页通过执行以下:-消除导致导航的闪烁。

trans-unit.source: - Persisting the scroll position when moving from page to page.
trans-unit.target: -在移动页时，则保留的滚动位置。

trans-unit.source: - Persisting element focus between navigations.
trans-unit.target: -将元素焦点之间导航。

trans-unit.source: - Retaining only the last page state in the browser's history.
trans-unit.target: -保留页面状态在浏览器的历史记录中仅最后一个。

trans-unit.source: Smart navigation is best used with ASP.NET pages that require frequent postbacks but with visual content that does not change dramatically on return.
trans-unit.target: 具有需要频繁回发的 ASP.NET 页、 但是并不返回显著改变的可见内容，最好使用智能导航。

trans-unit.source: Consider this carefully when deciding whether to set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 决定是否将此属性设置为时，请仔细考虑这一点`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if smart navigation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了智能导航功能;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the theme that is applied to the page early in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在页生命周期的初期应用于页面的主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property does not refer directly to a cascading style sheet (CSS).
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是指直接级联样式表 (CSS)。

trans-unit.source: The property contains the name of an ASP.NET theme, which can include CSS files within it.
trans-unit.target: 属性包含 ASP.NET 主题，可以包括 CSS 文件中的名称。

trans-unit.source: The StyleSheetTheme property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page early in the page life cycle, whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A> property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page later in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: StyleSheetTheme 属性指定在页面生命周期的早期应用于的页面主题的名称，而<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A>属性指定更高版本中页的生命周期应用于的页面主题的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that settings on the page take precedence over settings in the style sheet theme.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着在页上的设置，优先于样式表主题中的设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You typically set a value for this property in the page directive or by overriding the property.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在页面指令中或通过重写属性，可设置此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: For information, see the following topics: - [How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes Programmatically](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))
trans-unit.target: 有关信息，请参阅以下主题:-[如何︰ 应用 ASP.NET 主题](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [如何︰ 以编程方式应用 ASP.NET 主题](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))

trans-unit.source: The name of the theme that is applied to the page early in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在页面生命周期的初期应用于页面主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the StyleSheetTheme property after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 已尝试设置 StyleSheetTheme 属性后的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>调用了方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>

trans-unit.source: StyleSheetTheme is set to an invalid theme name.
trans-unit.target: StyleSheetTheme 设置为无效的主题名称。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*> method is called, not by the property setter.
trans-unit.target: 时，将引发此异常<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>方法，不是由调用属性 setter。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the page theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置页面主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: The Theme property sets the name of the theme used for the page.
trans-unit.target: 主题属性设置的页使用的主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: If you want the settings on the page to take precedence over the settings in the theme, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.StyleSheetTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要优先于主题中的设置页上的设置，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.StyleSheetTheme%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.StyleSheetTheme%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The Theme property must be set prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event; setting the Theme property after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event will cause an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 主题属性必须之前设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件; 设置后的主题属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件将导致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>

trans-unit.source: The specified theme must exist as either an application or a global theme.
trans-unit.target: 作为应用程序或全局主题必须存在指定的主题。

trans-unit.source: If the theme does not exist, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题不存在，<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发异常。</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: The name of the page theme.
trans-unit.target: 页面主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set Theme after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref> event has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置后的主题<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref>已发生事件。

trans-unit.source: Theme is set to an invalid theme name.
trans-unit.target: 主题设置为无效的主题名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title for the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置页的标题。

trans-unit.source: Use the Title property to set the page title in the HTML header sent to the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Title 属性在发送到请求的浏览器的 HTML 标头中设置页面标题。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The page must contain a `head` element that has the attribute `runat="server"`, otherwise the title will not render.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 页面中必须包含`head`具有属性的元素`runat="server"`，否则标题将不会呈现。

trans-unit.source: The title of the page.
trans-unit.target: 页的标题。

trans-unit.source: The Title property requires a header control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Title 属性需要页上的标头控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> object for the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref>当前 Web 请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪跟踪，并显示有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。

trans-unit.source: For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing at the page or application level.
trans-unit.target: 无法在呈现的页面中显示的跟踪数据，必须启用页面或应用程序级别的跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Tracing on a page is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在页面上的跟踪功能被禁用。

trans-unit.source: To enable tracing for a page, use the directive `<% @ Page trace="true" %>`.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用页跟踪，使用指令`<% @ Page trace="true" %>`。

trans-unit.source: To enable tracing for an entire application, you must enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用整个应用程序的跟踪，必须在应用程序的配置文件中，Web.config 文件中，驻留在应用程序的根目录下启用它。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Data from the <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> object for the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: 从数据<xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref>当前 Web 请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating whether tracing is enabled for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个值，该值指示是否为启用跟踪<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the `Trace` attribute to `true` in the directive in the .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 设置`Trace`属性设为`true`的指令的.aspx 文件中。

trans-unit.source: When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property.
trans-unit.target: 当请求页时，动态生成的类来设置属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if tracing is enabled for the page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果页; 启用了跟踪否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the mode in which trace statements are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: 设置中的跟踪语句页面显示的模式。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the `TraceMode` attribute in the directive in the .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 设置`TraceMode`的指令的.aspx 文件中的属性。

trans-unit.source: When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property.
trans-unit.target: 当请求页时，动态生成的类来设置属性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.TraceMode"></xref> enumeration members.

trans-unit.source: Sets the level of transaction support for the page.

trans-unit.source: Stops persistence of control state for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 停止指定的控件的控件状态的持久性。

trans-unit.source: Custom server controls that use control state must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> on each request during before the state is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 使用控件状态的自定义服务器控件必须调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>对每个请求之前保存的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Registration for control state is not carried over from request to request during a postback.
trans-unit.target: 控件状态的注册将不会从请求到请求在回发期间。

trans-unit.source: Use the UnregisterRequiresControlState method to ensure that control state is not persisted for controls that no longer need to be persisted for postback.
trans-unit.target: 使用 UnregisterRequiresControlState 方法来确保控件状态不会持久保存的不再需要保留的回发的控件。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the UnregisterRequiresControlState method is invoked when using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A> method to remove a control from a controls collection.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，会调用 UnregisterRequiresControlState 方法，使用时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>方法以从控件集合中移除的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> for which to stop persistence of control state.
